keyPolicies.policyDescription: Marc Bayliss will vote to leave the EU at every opportunity and back the Prime Minister's Brexit deal to respect the democratic vote and control money, laws, and borders.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVESTING IN OUR NHS AND SCHOOLS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Marc Bayliss will fight to ensure Sheffield South East gets its share of the extra £34bn for NHS and the £14bn boost for schools, with every primary school getting at least £4000 per pupil and secondary school £5000 per pupil.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: MORE POLICE OFFICERS TO KEEP OUR STREETS SAFE
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives have promised to boost police numbers by 20,000 over the next 3 years. In South Yorkshire, this will see an extra 151 officers next year.

issues.brexitEurope: Marc Bayliss will vote to leave the EU at every opportunity and back the Prime Minister's Brexit deal to respect the democratic vote.
issues.education: Marc Bayliss will fight for the £14bn boost for schools, ensuring at least £4000 per primary school pupil and £5000 per secondary school pupil.
issues.health: Marc Bayliss will ensure Sheffield South East gets its share of the £34bn promised for the NHS.

contactInformation.address: Office of The Registrar of Electors, Soth Yorkshire S63 0JF
